title: The Ultimate Reroll
body:
So when Hextec crafting first came out I instantly got the skin shards for PFE and SGU, I've spent the last year waiting, hoping for DJ Sona so that I can do this.

http://i.imgur.com/b2rzKb5.png

And what do I get?

Iron Solari Leona. Not even any essence to go with it.
Aren't you meant to get essence when you get a skin worth significantly less than the skins to put into the grinder?
